QuestData.Title: Redistribution of Power
QuestData.Description:
Welcome back, dear test subject.
Today's experiment is...
<Pristy flips through some papers and smiles.>
...My pet project, the NRG-100!
I am quite pleased with the potential improvements I've made to efficiency, potency, and destructivity.
And the only thing I had to sacrifice was stability!
When you're ready to proceed, strap on the NRG-100.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the NRG-100 to charge $2oa energy cells.
